meta.name: description
meta.content: The Pass Christian Public School District is accredited by AdvancED and the State of Mississippi. Our District earned the highest academic performance level rating in the state –

li.a: COVID-19 RESPONSE PAGE: Pirate e-Learning Academy

div.span: Governor Reeves closed school buildings for the remainder of the school year; he did not end school. In Pirate Nation, learning will continue via our Pirate e-Learning Academy. --- We have a new graduation date! Our children deserve a chance to walk the stage. Our new date is June 19, 2020 @ 7 pm! --- Stay Safe, Pirates!

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div: The mission of the Pass Christian Public School District, in partnership with families and community, is to empower all students to be college-career ready learners, critical thinkers, and contributing citizens.
FOCUS BELIEF : We believe students excel when learning is a shared responsibility.
Focus Goal: Promote academic success and wellness by maintaining a safe and orderly environment.

span.span: of Schools are Blue Ribbon Schools

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

h3.a: PCSD Aims for New Graduation Date

div.div: In true Pirate spirit, we will not surrender to our present set of circumstances. With much feedback from our seniors, teachers, and parents, we have made the decision to hoist our anchors and set sail to a new Graduation Destination -- June 19, 2020. We look to the day that the Visionary Class of 2020 will cross the stage of graduation in front of their Pirate family as they prepare to begin a journey anew. Thank you for your continued support! Crossbones up, Pirates! #nosurrender
The Pass Christian Public School District proudly presents the Visionary Class of 2020!

h3.a: Governor Reeves Closes School Buildings Remainder of Year

div.div: Today, Governor Reeves addressed the state in a live stream video. He closed school buildings for the remainder of the school year. However, learning will continue to take place via distance learning in our Pirate e-Learning Academy. We will carry our mission forward and continue to serve our students TOGETHER. Stay the course, Pirates, and stay focused on our goals for our children. We are Pirate strong, and we will never surrender to our circumstances! The journey continues!
Pass Christian School District will begin serving free grab & go meals starting Thursday, March 19th.
2020-2021 Pass Christian Public School District Pre K-4 APPLICATIONS POSTPONED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE !

img.alt: Dustin Allison - QB of the Year

h3.a: Allison Wins "Rocky" Byrd Quarterback of the Year

div.div: The National Football Foundation Hall of Fame Mississippi Gulf Coast Chapter’s awarded Dustin Allison the “Rocky” Byrd Quarterback of the Year and scholar-athlete award. Congratulations, Dustin!

img.alt: PCES Awarded National ESEA Distinguished Schools Status

h3.a: PCES Named National ESEA Distinguished School

div.div: PCES was one of only two schools in MS to earn this prestigious award for their work in closing the achievement gap! Congratulations, PCES!
Location: Pearl High School, 500 Pirates Cove, Pearl, MS 39208, USA
